meaning: seduce, call, send for, wear, put on, ride in, buy, eat, drink, catch (cold)

onyomiExamples.meaning: convening, calling together (e.g. parliament), call-up (for military service)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to call, to invite, to send for, to summon, to eat, to drink, to put on, to wear, to ride, to catch (a cold), to take (a bath), to tickle (one's fancy), to put on (years), to commit (seppuku), to do, used to show respect
